subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Evan Gattis was 19 when he disappeared off the baseball grid in 2006 to do some soul searching and work a number of odd jobs. Now he’s the Atlanta Braves’ catcher and No. 4 hitter.
snippet: Evan Gattis was 19 when he disappeared off the baseball grid in 2006 to do some soul searching and work a number of odd jobs. Now he’s the Atlanta Braves’ catcher and No. 4 hitter.
